entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
